curam.util.resources

Class DatabaseShortname

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.resources.DatabaseShortname

  • public final class DatabaseShortname
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to handle shortening of database related metadata to the its required length.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void clearShortNames()
      Clear the current ShortNames mappings.
      static boolean isUseShortNames()
      Indicates whether short names substitution is active.
      static void setUseShortNames(boolean shortNames)
      Set the flag indicating whether short name substitution should be performed on object names.
      static java.lang.String shorten(java.lang.String name)
      Perform "short name substitution" on one word to bring its length down to no more than 18 characters.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • setUseShortNames

        public static void setUseShortNames(boolean shortNames)
        Set the flag indicating whether short name substitution should be performed on object names.
        Parameters:
        shortNames - A boolean which indicates if short names should be used.

      • isUseShortNames

        public static boolean isUseShortNames()
        Indicates whether short names substitution is active.
        Returns:
        The state of the short names flag.

      • clearShortNames

        public static void clearShortNames()
        Clear the current ShortNames mappings.

      • shorten

        public static java.lang.String shorten(java.lang.String name)
                                throws AppRuntimeException
        Perform "short name substitution" on one word to bring its length down to no more than 18 characters. If the word consists of several words delimited by dot characters then each component word is shortened independently.
        Parameters:
        name - Name to be processed. This must not be null.
        Returns:
        Short name result in uppercase. If short names are switched off or if the word is no longer than 18 characters then the original word is returned in uppercase.
        Throws:
        AppRuntimeException - RUN_ID_SHORTNAME_DUPLICATE_EXCEPTION - if duplicate ShortName keys are loaded.
        AppRuntimeException - RUN_ID_INVALID_SHORTNAME_ENTRY - if an invalid name/value pair is found in the loaded file.
